name: Coffee Break (itch) (kanenines)
description:
In this action platformer demo you play as a barista who is just trying to leave for her break, when a rude customer turns all the shops food and coffee into monsters! 

Use WASD and Space keys to jump and defeat monsters while also racing against the clock towards freedom. Will our brave barista make it in time? 

A demo made for Collaborative Productions class at Maine College of Art and Design in the Animation and Game Art Department 

Made by Camryn Graffius, Kane Meinck, Max Gonzalez, Mace Button, and Jacob Logue

Note: Mac version has current bug where enemy projectiles collider with platforms
